entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

@realDonaldTrump So dumb he’s 💯 percent predictable. Blaming others for his short comings.

Remember @realDonaldTrump held rallies, went golfing, lied said it was all good also his daughter and fam went on vacation all after they knew of the dangers of COVID19. Endless vacation my ass! #VoteBlue
